data.title: IBM’s Acquisition of Polar Security

data.meta_site_name: Cravath - IBM’s Acquisition of Polar Security
data.text:
On May 16, 2023, IBM announced it has acquired Polar Security, an innovator in technology that helps companies discover, continuously monitor and secure cloud and software‑as‑a‑service (SaaS) application data. Cravath is representing IBM in connection with the transaction.

The Cravath team is led by partner Claudia J. Ricciardi and includes foreign associate attorney Caroline Alexandra Forschbach and associate Luke A. Martin on M&A matters; partner J. Leonard Teti II, senior attorney Kiran Sheffrin and associate Christopher M. Winters on tax matters; partners Jonathan J. Katz and Amanda Hines Gold, senior attorney Sarah W. Colangelo and associate Bianca Hsing on executive compensation and benefits matters; and senior attorney Joyce Law on real estate matters. Shoumick M. Hasan also worked on M&A matters.
